name: Gluttony (Chip, oh_rii)
description:
TONY THE LOVABLE

Tony was a happy fellow. He had so many friends that he loved, and they loved him too.

Everybody except one person was his friend. Envy, tall and lonely, didn't like that everybody liked Tony. So Envy cursed Tony!
Tony was cursed to consume everything he loves.

Tony became hungry. Very hungry.

CONSUME THE WORLD

You must eat your way through the world, eating all of Tony's present friends to complete a level. Careful though, Tony's stomach isn't bottomless. Even the hungriest, most cursed person must eventually empty themselves before they can continue eating.

PUZZLE FEAST

There are 10 unique puzzles in this prototype.

Eat yourslef through all of them, finding the correct path in each, to win!

TEAM HUNGER

This game prototype was made by Janosch Büchi and Gabrielle Gerber at the University of the Arts Zurich.
